question: How do I reset my password?
answer: Go to Account > Reset Password.

question: How can I contact customer support?
answer: Visit the Contact Us page or email support@example.com.

question: How do I sign up for an account?
answer: Click on the Sign Up button in the top-right corner and fill out the registration form.

question: What should I do if I forget my password?
answer: Use the Forgot Password link on the login page to reset your password via email.

question: How do I submit feedback or reviews?
answer: Login and go to your dashboard, then click on Review on navigation bar to provide your feedback.

question: Where can I find online courses?
answer: Visit the Courses page from the main menu to explore all available online courses.

question: How do I logout of the system?
answer: Click the Logout button available on any page to safely sign out and clear your session.

question: How do I access the University Finder?
answer: Access the University Finder by going to Explore page from navigation bar then clicking on university finder.

question: How can I explore career paths?
answer: Go to the Careers section available on your dashboard and main career menus.

question: Where can I browse online courses?
answer: Access the Course Finder by going to Explore page from navigation bar then clicking on course finder.

question: How do I use the Degree Recommender?
answer: The Degree Recommender is available on the Explore page to suggest academic degrees based on your interests.

question: How do I upload my resume?
answer: You can upload your resume through the Resume Upload option in your chatbot.

question: How can I check my ATS (Applicant Tracking System) score?
answer: Check your ATS score after uploading your resume via the Resume Upload option in your chatbot.

question: How do I find my suitable job role?
answer: Use the Suitable Job Role analysis feature in your chatbot after uploading your resume.

question: How do I login to the system?
answer: Click on the Login button at the top-right corner, enter your username and password, then submit the form.

question: How do I access the About Us page?
answer: You can access the About Us page by clicking on the About Us link located in the footer or main navigation menu.

question: Can I access pages without logging in?
answer: Since you are already logged in, you don't need to worry about that.
